title: The cantilevered Refuge area on cantilever will be permissible at the mid- landing of the staircase only
clause_text: The cantilevered Refuge area on cantilever will be permissible at the mid- landing of the staircase only. All other refuge areas shall be within the building line only. The cantilevered refuge area shall necessarily be of RCC type.

source_pdf.text_snippet: The cantilevered Refuge area on cantilever will be permissible at the mid- landing of the staircase only. All other refuge areas shall be within the building line only.
